profile.name: Tyrion Lannister
profile.currentTitle: Hand of the King & Chief Strategic Advisor
profile.summary: Two-time Hand of the King, Master of Coin, and the most effective political strategist in the Seven Kingdoms. Overcame systemic prejudice and family hostility through intellectual superiority, strategic alliances, and a refusal to be defined by others' limitations. Survived assassination, trial by combat, exile, and siege warfare — emerging as the chief advisor to three monarchs.

skills.name: Strategic Planning
evidence: Designed the defense of King's Landing against Stannis Baratheon's naval assault using wildfire at the Battle of Blackwater
Orchestrated alliance-building strategy uniting Northern forces, Unsullied, and Dothraki under a single command structure
Developed succession framework that transitioned Westeros from hereditary monarchy to elective council

skills.name: Political Analysis
evidence: Correctly identified Joffrey's instability as existential threat to Lannister power and implemented containment strategies
Mapped the political motivations of every major house during the War of the Five Kings
Predicted Cersei's self-destructive governance patterns years before their full manifestation

skills.name: Stakeholder Management
evidence: Managed competing interests of Lannister family, Small Council members, and King's Landing nobility simultaneously
Built working relationships with hostile factions including formerly enslaved peoples, Dothraki leadership, and Northern lords
Navigated family politics between Tywin, Cersei, and Jaime while maintaining operational effectiveness

skills.name: Alliance Building
evidence: Brokered alliance between Daenerys Targaryen and Jon Snow that united the largest military force in Westerosi history
Negotiated mountain clan support during the War of the Five Kings through promises of political recognition
Built cross-factional coalition that elected Bran Stark as king through persuasion rather than force

skills.name: Negotiation
evidence: Negotiated his own survival with Meereenese slave masters, Dothraki captors, and multiple hostile courts
Secured temporary peace in Meereen through compromise with the Masters of Slaver's Bay
Talked his way out of execution by both Stark and Targaryen forces through pure rhetorical skill

skills.name: Crisis Management
evidence: Took command of King's Landing defense when all other leaders fled during Battle of Blackwater
Managed Meereen's governance during Daenerys's absence including economic crisis and insurgent threat
Stabilized post-war King's Landing governance amid destroyed infrastructure and decimated population

skills.name: Public Administration
evidence: Served as acting Hand managing city infrastructure, food supply, and public order during wartime
Administered Casterly Rock's drainage and cistern systems — improving sanitation infrastructure for thousands
Reorganized King's Landing's Small Council with functional governance portfolios after Bran's coronation

skills.name: Financial Management
evidence: Served as Master of Coin managing Crown revenues, taxation, and Iron Bank debt obligations
Understood that Lannister wealth was depleted — intelligence others failed to detect until crisis point
Managed war financing and supply logistics during multiple military campaigns

skills.name: Persuasive Communication
evidence: Delivered trial speech that swayed public opinion and exposed the corruption of King's Landing's justice system
Convinced Daenerys Targaryen to accept him as advisor despite being a Lannister — her family's sworn enemy
Persuaded the lords of the Great Council to accept an unprecedented new form of governance

skills.name: Intelligence Gathering
evidence: Maintained network of informants including Varys, Bronn, and Shae across multiple political contexts
Used Podrick Payne and other trusted agents for discreet intelligence operations
Identified threats from within the Small Council through careful observation and information cross-referencing

skills.name: Pattern Recognition
evidence: Recognized Littlefinger's manipulation strategy before most other court figures
Identified that the Night King threat required unprecedented alliance-building — not conventional military response
Detected shifts in Daenerys's judgment and psychological state through behavioral pattern analysis

skills.name: Military Strategy
evidence: Designed the wildfire chain and ship-trap at the Battle of Blackwater Bay
Advised on siege tactics and defensive positioning during the Battle of Winterfell
Understood logistics requirements for moving armies across continents including supply chain and naval transport

skills.name: Siege Warfare
evidence: Led the defense of King's Landing against a numerically superior naval force
Understood fortification weaknesses and defensive positioning from extensive historical study
Advised on Meereen's defense against the Masters' siege including naval and ground tactics

skills.name: Conflict Resolution
evidence: Mediated disputes between Daenerys and her advisors including Jorah Mormont, Daario Naharis, and Grey Worm
De-escalated confrontation between Jon Snow and Daenerys over Northern independence
Resolved resource allocation disputes in post-war King's Landing through equitable distribution frameworks

skills.name: Cross-Cultural Communication
evidence: Successfully communicated with and earned respect of Dothraki, Unsullied, and Free Cities cultures
Adapted communication style from Westerosi court formality to Essosi merchant directness as context demanded
Built trust with formerly enslaved populations despite representing the Westerosi ruling class

skills.name: Risk Assessment
evidence: Accurately assessed the risk of Cersei's betrayal when she pledged military support against the Night King
Evaluated political risk of every major alliance and correctly identified which would hold and which would fracture
Assessed personal survival risk in dozens of life-threatening situations and chose optimal responses

skills.name: Leadership Under Pressure
evidence: Led troops at the Battle of Blackwater when the King and Kingsguard abandoned the defense
Maintained command authority and morale during the siege of Meereen
Kept governance functioning during the aftermath of Daenerys's destruction of King's Landing

skills.name: Historical Analysis
evidence: Encyclopedic knowledge of Westerosi political history used to predict contemporary alliance patterns
Studied every siege, treaty, and succession crisis in the Seven Kingdoms' history
Applied historical precedent to design the elective monarchy that ended centuries of hereditary succession wars

skills.name: Resilience
evidence: Survived attempted murder by his sister, trial for regicide, and exile across the Narrow Sea
Rebuilt career and influence after being stripped of all titles, wealth, and family connections
Maintained intellectual clarity and strategic effectiveness despite sustained trauma and personal loss

skills.name: Adaptive Leadership
evidence: Transitioned from Lannister family operative to independent advisor to Targaryen queen to Stark administration
Adapted governance style from wartime crisis management to peacetime institution-building
Led effectively across radically different organizational cultures — feudal, military, revolutionary, and democratic

skills.name: Talent Assessment
evidence: Identified Bronn's tactical value and recruited him from sellsword to castle lord through strategic investment
Recognized Podrick Payne's loyalty and competence when others dismissed him
Selected effective administrators for post-war Small Council based on capability rather than lineage

skills.name: Rhetoric
evidence: Trial speech at King's Landing is considered one of the most effective pieces of oratory in Westerosi history
Used wit and verbal dexterity to survive situations where physical force was not an option
Convinced hostile audiences through logic, humor, and emotional intelligence in equal measure

skills.name: Economic Analysis
evidence: Identified the Crown's unsustainable debt to the Iron Bank of Braavos
Understood trade dynamics between Westeros and the Free Cities including tariff implications
Analyzed Meereen's economic collapse after the abolition of slavery and developed transition frameworks

skills.name: Emotional Intelligence
evidence: Read the emotional states of monarchs, warriors, and politicians with exceptional accuracy
Used empathy and humor to build trust in adversarial environments
Understood that Daenerys's increasing isolation was a governance risk — attempted intervention through counsel

skills.name: Organizational Design
evidence: Restructured the Small Council with clear functional portfolios after decades of patronage-based appointments
Designed governance framework for Meereen's transition from slave economy to free labor market
Proposed the elective monarchy structure that fundamentally redesigned Westerosi succession

skills.name: Budget Management
evidence: Managed Crown finances as Master of Coin during wartime austerity
Allocated limited resources across military, infrastructure, and social needs in post-war King's Landing
Identified financial fraud and waste in royal expenditures through forensic analysis of treasury records

purpose: To prove that the mind is the truest weapon — that wisdom, wit, and moral courage can reshape the world more durably than any army or bloodline.

workHistory.title: Hand of the King
workHistory.description: Chief advisor and head of government. Rebuilding institutions, infrastructure, and governance frameworks after catastrophic war. Leading the first elective monarchy in Westerosi history.

workHistory.title: Hand of the Queen
workHistory.description: Chief strategic advisor during campaign to reclaim the Iron Throne. Managed alliance-building, military strategy, and governance of Meereen. Brokered the Stark-Targaryen alliance against the Night King.

workHistory.title: Master of Coin
workHistory.description: Managed Crown finances including Iron Bank debt obligations, wartime taxation, and royal wedding expenditures. Identified systemic fiscal insolvency.

workHistory.title: Acting Hand of the King
workHistory.description: Served as acting Hand during Tywin Lannister's military campaign. Led defense of King's Landing at the Battle of Blackwater. Managed city governance, food supply, and public order during siege.

workHistory.title: Independent Advisor & Scholar
workHistory.description: Traveled extensively through Essos studying governance systems, trade networks, and political structures. Built knowledge base spanning multiple cultures and economic models.

workHistory.title: Infrastructure Administrator
workHistory.description: Managed drainage systems, cisterns, and sanitation infrastructure for Casterly Rock. First leadership role — assigned as deliberate slight but executed with competence.

education.institution: Library of Casterly Rock & The Citadel Archives
education.field: History, Political Philosophy, Military Strategy, Economics
